website_summaries.verdict: Excellent Chromebook with a large display screen and a desirable price point.
pros: Body of the laptop consists of aluminum, which allows for durability and a lightweight unit
Offers up to 12 hours of battery life
Full HD resolution in a 14-inch display screen, which is not common in Chromebooks
Works with both 2.4GHz and 5GHz Wi-Fi bands
cons: Lacks some processing power versus standard laptops

website_summaries.verdict: Offers a 14-inch screen, which is a nice feature to find in a low-priced Chromebook model.
pros: Lightweight design that also has some toughness
Very good battery life for working all day
Full HD display screen that measures 14 inches diagonally
Nice solid state drive capacity size of 32 GB
cons: Chromebook design won't be powerful enough for some people's needs

customer_reviews.title: Some versions are better than others
customer_reviews.text: There are several versions of the Acer Chromebook 14. Some versions are better than others. The advertised version, and the one I ordered, was the C5FM. The order confirmation indicated I was shipped the C5FM. I instead received the C5EM, which is inferior to the C5FM. I ended up returning it even after getting a credit because the wireless did not work well and was extremely slow. It's important to check the order carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...Awful customer service.!
customer_reviews.text: worst decision i have made...and sad that this is my second acer..should have leared a lesson. Customer service is useless..mostly from the Dominican Republic and their english is hard to understand. This pc has gone back and so called repaired! I guess you get what you pay for..and this is not worth the money for a one year product... do not fall for the price..it is not worth the aggrevation, the lack of support and the problems that occur within a year ...DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful that you are getting a new product
customer_reviews.text: I'm having trouble with product quality from non Amazon suppliers. The laptop was shipped in what looked like a new case but upon opening it, it appeared used and repackaged. I went online and found that the 1 year Acer warranty had already expired. Also upon turning it on, I got a blue screen. The trackpad is awful as are most Acer trackpads. Screen is beautiful and that's the really the only plus point of this chromebook. I have a much older Toshiba chromebook that's a lot nicer to use from a keyboard and trackpad perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed my first Chromebook but...
customer_reviews.text: A week after arrival the screen began blacking out, at first for a few seconds then I had to close the lid to get it to light up and then restart. THEN I kept getting error messages "Oh, Snap...." began. This happened 7 times within 20 minutes when I was working on something. They want you to give them feedback. I wanted to "snap" them. Let me add this computer is only used lightly. I am returning immediately, no patience for this.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Disconnects from wireless network
customer_reviews.text: Until recently, I was very satisfied with this laptop. Two months ago it began to disconnect from my wireless network whenever the lid was closed or whenever it was inactive for several minutes. It isn't the router. All other devices work fine and don't disconnect. To reconnect, I have to double-click on the network icon and then click on my specific network. I haven't been able to find a fix. It's very annoying. Since I wrote the first paragraph of this review, the disconnect problem has gotten worse. The Acer now disconnects from the router every few minutes. There is nothing wrong with the router. My husband's PC has no problems, and it is connected to the same router.
customer_reviews.author: M. Havens

customer_reviews.title: I bought this chromebook 1 month ago. I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chromebook 1 month ago. I lost the cursor this morning and called Acer to get help. They instructed me how to powerwash it. That instruction still did not fix the problem. I am returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Jean

customer_reviews.title: excellent keyboard, phenomenal IPS display
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how Acer did it. Aluminum, excellent keyboard, phenomenal IPS display, nice and hefty weight, USB 3.0's, HDMI port, Bluetooth, this computer just screams quality. And all for ~$275. They must save all the money not having to load windows on these things. Acer deserves some sort of medal for this laptop. Excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy recertified from 3rd party sellers
customer_reviews.text: After 5 moths of very light use the the laptop stopped reading the SSD and is useless. Also on this model the SSD is not replaceable. Acer recertified only has a 90 day warranty and since it was bought from a third party seller on amazon that 90 day warranty does not even apply.
customer_reviews.author: Austin P.

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad stopped working after 4 months, sent for repair broke again in a week, DON'T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Sent it in for repair. Only lasted a week before the touch pad stopped working again. Sent back again and they received it Feb 9. It is now Feb 24 and status is still "received". I have now basically been without a computer since the beginning of January. Wish I could give negative stars!!!! Received it back from repair 2/28 they received it 2/9. Let's see how long it lasts this time. Only had this 4 months and the touchpad has stopped working. I've done a reset, powerwash, signed in a guest, nothing has helped. It will recognize a bluetooth mouse and that's what I'm down to using. It hasn't been dropped or handled roughly. Don't buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tropigal

customer_reviews.title: Great for web browsing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer on Prime Day for a good price. I'm using it solely for web browsing. I keep a lot of tabs open, but no gaming, not too many videos, streaming etc. For that, it's great. It's really light and thin, and I think the display is fine for my purposes. I'm using to replace / suppliment a windows laptop that took FOREVER to boot up. I think for someone who wants a light, cheap laptop to surf and use google docs on, this is great. The touchpad doesn't have a button on it to right click, that is sort of annoying but otherwise I'd recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: HKG2015

customer_reviews.title: ***Buyers please Be Aware***
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two New Chromebook's for my children Model CB3-431-C5FM and they sent me the lower quality version Model: CB3-431-12K1 Twice! - ***Buyers please Be Aware*** The lower quality model is not Full HD1080 - Please check the real serial number and model number. They even put their own sticker on top of the manufacture sticker to cover it up. When I notice and complaint, they sent me a replacement and the same issue persisted. I wounder how many people have been defrauded.
customer_reviews.author: Erick G.

customer_reviews.title: Computer simplicity at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who's in his 70s. Wanted something that was user friendly and easy to fire and forget without a bunch of software and hardware upgrades to blow his mind with. This Chromebook met those needs. My father uses this almost daily to check email and get on the Internet when he needs to. The Google ecosystem was an easy transition for him since he has an Android phone. These Chromebooks are perfect for kids or the elderly who have simplistic needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend who admired by ChromeBook 14 that I had bought earlier for myself. Unfortunately, she was unable to purchase one during Amazon Prime Days, so I bought her one as a gift. So far, she loves the Chromebook's ease of use and long battery life! I only bought it for myself when I travel and love the larger screen versus trying to use my phone to search, plus its a lot lighter than my 17.3" notebook that I usually carry. Overall, I would recommend it to any user looking for a light and sleek, user friendly laptop with a great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like chromebooks.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Chromebook and I am definitely not a fan. The laptop works great, turns on quickly, and feels well built however the problem for me is that its a Chromebook. If you want a machine to ONLY go in the internet with than this is for you. Even word processing can only be done on google docs. If you want a Chromebook, buy this. If you want a computer, dont, its no where near the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Someguy3742

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use / Fast
customer_reviews.text: After a year, it's still doing a great job. As Christmas gift to my wife, it more than filled the bill. She keeps it chair-side in the living room and prefers it to her desktop computer because it's much faster - nearly instant on. Works well with wireless mouse; WiFi is fast. Solid state components make it fast. Chromebooks make things easier in many ways because of the integrated approach of Google - her email is available on her Chromebook as well as an Android phone. Downsides: won't work with our USB-connected printer - wireless printer required. No "delete" key so one is required to do a non-intuitive backspace to dump a selection to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: it is a great device for people like me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student who use laptop mainly for writing papers, conducting researches, and streaming videos. Because I carry this laptop everywhere in campus, weight is also an important factor for me. Overall, the quality is satisfying as long as I stick to my abovementioned purposes. It's premium design, full HD and wide 14inches(which are essential for video watching), and not too heavy to carry around. One problem that I found is its upper part feel very loose whenever I open this device. I'm afraid it would become even looser as time passes. Other than that, it is a great device for people like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best chromebook for the price
customer_reviews.text: I know the specs on this laptop are close to mediocre but let me just say that build quality is EXCELLENT. I bought this for my gf and compared it to my Acer Swift 3, they look and feel exactly alike. Battery life is awesome, screen looks perfect as well as viewing angles, speakers are a little low but nothing to get mad about. Trackpad is weird at first but it gets better over time and the keyboard has an excellent travel distance.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Tamez

customer_reviews.title: It's just right
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new laptop to take care of personal things like emails, banking, amazon orders etc. I did a lot of research and often felt overwhelmed with all the options between laptops and Chromebooks. I really didn't have a big budget for the new computer either. This Acer 14 Chromebook is perfect for what I needed. It turns on quickly unlike my much older Acer Laptop which took SOOOO long to start and load. The set up was a flash, and got connected to the internet quickly. I also have an Android phone so the switch to this Chromebook was very easy and everything synced through Google and Gmail.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good performance.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Might regret not having touchscreen later but it was a choice I knew I was making. Fast performance, great viewing. I purchased this primarily for remoting in to my office computer when I am on the road. Using Splashtop professional I find this is perfectly good for this purpose. You may want to add a mouse to one of the 2 usb ports, we find that more convenient. This now has access to the Android aps, some that I have tried do not work. I have watched Netflix on it and found the volume a bit weak, but I solved that by using my bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pires

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and excellent screen for a chrome book. Almost no heat emission and extended battery life is much appreciated, this make for a perfect travel computer. Web browsing is actually better than on a Windows OS computer. My biggest disappointment is the lack of a SD card slot for extending the storage capacity, sure you can use a micro USB drive but the protrudes from the computer and occupies a port. Why so cheap Acer? Minor concern is the power adapter, plug is very small and the contact area with the computer is also small which leads to questionable durability. Time will tell, but for now the performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Damain Phang

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, great price, quick shipment. After several days, I have only one complaint. Wish it had an sd card slot. I got a usb 3.0 sd adapter to use with it. Gives me the ability to transfer and view photos, videos, and add aps. I especially liked the 5gh wifi band. My download speed is almost 300 mb/sec. This makes a great addition to my old desktop computer which may croak at any time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ucandoit

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 11/27/2017. Connected to 21" monitor via HDMI cable ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 11/27/2017. Connected to 21" monitor via HDMI cable. Monitor screen turns green occasionally requiring me to unplug HDMI cable or reboot to fix problem. I have a second chrome book (Toshiba) which never demonstrates this problem even with same monitor, cable etc. Will contact Tech support tomorrow. UPDATE 3 11 2018 Called Tech Support several days ago AND got through pretty quick!!! The tech talked me through a procedure and I haven't had the issue since!!! As long as it stays "fixed" I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I brought this Chromebook mostly to take my writing with me. It has a nicer screen than my older one and boy does it run worlds better. I haven't had any issues with it (and I've had it for a while) and it's very easy to carry around from work back home to travel. It gets the job done for what I need on the go and the battery life is fantastic. It took me a while to decide *which* Chromebook I wanted, but I don't regret going with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nao

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with Gallium OS 3.0
customer_reviews.text: See attached picture. The device model is cb3-431-c7ex . It is compatible with MrChromebox BIOS. You need to download gallium OS braswell to use it as a full linux Ubuntu computer. You need to unscrew the contact bolt to allow booting directly from internal hard drive to linux. This is my 3rd purchase of the cb3-431 . They change the minor model number every year over the past 3 years, but they are all compatible with linux.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Died after two months
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because it was a fine chromebook for the first two months. But it suddenly stopped being able to charge. I tested the power supply and it is putting out the rated 19 volts, but the charging led on the chromebook doesn't light, and the device is completely unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: David Hume

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job for the price. Good stopgap if you're between computers.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Chromebook. I couldn't afford to buy a new laptop so I thought I wod try this... I have been using about 8 months and it's pretty good with most things but will crash and freeze sometimes. I was debating whether I could use this as my laptop from now on or would need to save for a new real laptop... I am saving as I dont think this machine will have the longevity I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great computer great value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to replace his desktop PC because I'll be working from home and needing to use the office for work. He is loving it. The two of us sit in bed and use our respective laptops every night - our kids think we're silly. It's just fun. Working great although there was definitely a learning curve for the chromebook vs an old PC experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for one of my children a few years ago, and just bought another for another child. Has served us well, and great value. There are cheaper ones, but this has enough memory and storage, full HD screen, everything you could want for only a little more than lesser models. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on getting any support
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a number of laptops over the past few years. The Acer computers can be OK, but if you happen to get a bad one, good luck getting them to repair or replace it. Their customer service and product support are terrible. Send it back in 30 days to Amazon before you have to rely on their support.
customer_reviews.author: spratjack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for today's student who accesses Google Apps for school
customer_reviews.text: I looked at reviews and ordered this Chromebook for my daughter to do her homework. The battery life is impressive. The fact that you don't really need anti-virus software is fantastic. The speed is impressive as well. We use this for surfing the web, google classroom applications, and other online apps. Other than the lack of a right-click button and the unique scrolling of google docs, this has been a great purchase. I will most likely by another one in a few years for my son. The Chromebook is very light weight. The keys are responsive. The keyboard is bit narrower than a normal computer (so it seems), but easy to get used to. So far we love this Chromebook!
customer_reviews.author: Pruss

customer_reviews.title: Does ok but I'm should have bought something different for me personally
customer_reviews.text: Eh I'm on the fence. It works pretty well for a kids laptop and it wasn't expensive. But I think I wouldn't want it for myself. You can't download apple apps and we have iPhones so that annoying. There's no disc drive so you can't use discs which I know are somewhat outdated but you can't watch movies on it. I'm 40 and when we travel we still may watch a movie, we don't always have wifi. I think I will do a little more research next time.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Charger connection is flimsey
customer_reviews.text: Well, 10 months in and it's time for another Chromebook. The charger connection will not maintain a charge. I can not use it plugged in. I suspect the charger connector, connections became lose internally. You get what you pay for I guess. Disappointed. Will look for another mfg for it's replacement
customer_reviews.author: coach georgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: After owning it for a little over a year, the screen on it has begun to fail. It randomly goes dark or washes out and the mouse freezes. It has never even been dropped or traveled with, so I am disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wordpress, is for movies
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is great if you have realistic expectations. This is good for watching movies and browsing the web. It uses Kodi. It’s great for writing emails and writing small documents. This is NOT good for Wordpress, web design, working with long documents (even on google docs/sheets) or any sort of image editing whatsoever. The long battery life and low price is appealing but keep in mind, if you need a better processor, you are simply not going to find it at this price point. That being said this chromebook is dope.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Leisure Computer
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, lightweight and really is perfect for browsing. I use it for leisure but think that this computer would likely struggle for any moderate amount of work at the office. At the time of this review (9/10), Google has not rolled out Android apps but I imagine that it will make the laptop an even better product. The biggest negative would be the trackpad. It's not unusable but doesn't feel high quality and doesn't really feel 100% responsive. I bought a wireless mouse and it solved that problem. Still would love for a better trackpad when I'm on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Shea

customer_reviews.title: End of 2018 - still a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Through 2-year history this laptop was updated to run Android and Linux apps, so you can enjoy both: mobile messengers and Linux image-editing software (Gimp, Krita). Emulation of both systems has some minor issues, but overall it works fine. Sound quality and battery life are unexpectedly good for the price. My laptop came to me with protective case and wireless mouse, I didn't see that in the description and I really appreciate that addition.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Konoplev

customer_reviews.title: Replacing my old Chromebook with this one was a snap!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need windows, and I find chromebook to be easy and fun to use. The only down side is that they don't push updates after the computer is 4 years old or so. The first thing I did when I received this one was look at the date of manufacture. I bought this in November 2018 and it was manufactured in June of 2017, so it was sitting on the shelf for over a year, hence I lost a year of useful computer life : (
customer_reviews.author: SherryBerry

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome for my middle school daughter
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome for my middle school daughter. did have to purchase a corded mouse though because no left & right mouse click on touchpad which isn't usually an issue. great that everything is google docs and such as it melds with her school and homework. very nice looking and great display. streams movies excellent, my daughter usually uses headphones, but speakers are good considering the size and price point. would definitely buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: This third party supplier doesn’t send the right model as advertised. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Takshing A. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Fast
customer_reviews.text: My husband gifted me this chromebook for Valentines Day to use for college. He wanted something that could browse the internet fast - and this chromebook does just that! :D I also got the “Casii ombré pink” keyboard cover & “Arvok 13-14” Sleeve Case from here on Amazon to spiff it up! I highly recommend both to go with this laptop!! I love how slim the design is - will fit easily into my backpack :) Highly Recommend for everyday or school use!
customer_reviews.author: Waifu

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chromebook but metal case is cold on legs
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 14-in HP Chromebook with this one and I actually like my old one better. Cons: - the metal case is really cold, especially when wearing shorts! - the higher resolution makes the defaults fonts and icons really small, but can be fixed with Ctrl-Shift-+ to change resolution Pros: - the screen is really nice and the matte finish cuts down on most of the glare - the keyboard feels good--nice solid keys but not too stiff
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling (because it's so cheap)
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent laptop for it's price. I only needed it for school assignments and watching videos while traveling, and it totally fulfills its purpose. It's so cheap that I wouldn't be too bummed if it got stolen. The one complaint I have is the speaker loudness and quality leaves a bit to be desired. But overall totally fulfills its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! She was complaining about her computer being slow. She needed something for college that would let her do online lessons and use Google docs to do her homework. It’s really faster than her windows laptop and she is really happy with it. The keyboard is easy to use like a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Solid for a chromebook, but awful display
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the display of this chromebook. It is so washed out that it is hard to use. I can't return it as I got rid of the box, but if having a computer that doesn't constantly give you a headache is important to you then I'd look elsewhere. Otherwise, it is okay and like my previous chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Miah L.

customer_reviews.title: Good chromebook.  Quite large and thin
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this because she wanted a larger screen. Personally I think a smaller screen and less metal around the keyboard would be better. The metal can be cold. It's very thin, performs well, and has a very long battery life. If you use ChromeOS a lot, these should be familiar features.
customer_reviews.author: G. FarnsworthTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent, for a change.
customer_reviews.text: Best computer investment I've had to date, and trust me, I've had several PC's over the years. I am fed-up with windows and it's constant update and attacks. Not to mention the additional investment required keeping it safe. Yes, don't get me wrong, there is a place for a full-function computer, and when I need that extra horse-power, I know where to get it. But, this fits my everyday needs perfectly and I'm glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great device for browsing the internet. Watching Netflix or Hulu. Hulu app is not supported for this computer so you will need to use the browser. The keyboard is difficult to get used to due to the placement and spacing of the keys compared to a regular keyboard. Audio is quiet so you will want to use some kind of headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Acer Chromebook 14 now for about 4 months. Not one problem. From the other reviews, I knew some of the shortcuts for chromebook & I looked up others. Ie, I made the escape key my delete key....I also opened a new gmail acct when I started it up for the first time. It couldn't be easier or work smoother, plus the battery lasts forever. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook was painfully slow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Chromebook to replace my wife's 5-year-old chrome book. somehow this laptop is far worse than hers. could only have 2-3 tabs open max and opening chrome (the computers entire purpose) took 10 seconds normally. completely unusable, returned the Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This computer way outlived my expectations. I havent charged it in a week and it still has battery. It has so many cool features I am honestly shocked at the price. for a 4 gb it runs smooth and i love it. not sure why it has the option for touchscreen rating as it is not touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: A great Chromebook at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a few weeks researching Chromebook options. After comparing the offerings from many different manufacturers, I chose to buy the Acer 14. I wanted a larger screen than the original model, which I think was around 11 inches. But I also wanted portability and so I chose this 14 inch model. So far I am delighted with my choice. It starts up almost instantly, battery life has been excellent, and it works as advertised. I bought it to use when traveling instead of the IPad I own.
customer_reviews.author: MPT

customer_reviews.title: and it is so nice to be liberated from both Apple and Windows
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault this little computer. I haven't had a single problem with it so far, and it is so nice to be liberated from both Apple and Windows! Boot time is well below thirty seconds (twelve, last time I bothered to time it) and it does everything I want it to. I'm still getting used to not saving things, and working solely off GoogleDrive and the like is a little nervewracking, but it's light, well made, and the battery life is fantastic. If you're thinking about a netbook, I did very extensive research prior to buying this one and am very happy - I can recommend it wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: and this has been my favorite laptop ever
customer_reviews.text: First time chromebook user, and this has been my favorite laptop ever. The battery life has started to go down after a year of solid use (still quite good), but the quality screen and ChromeOS make it worth it. Only for basic computer needs, which probably applies to the vast majority of the market anyways. Acer put together a solid package. The aluminum finish is great and holds up well, as have the keyboard and touchpad.
customer_reviews.author: Marc K

customer_reviews.title: so far, pretty good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: OMG, what is with the stickers? the "full 1080P" came off easly.. but the "chromebook 14" by the trackpad? It is one of those heavy duty foil backed stickers. IT came off.. but 3/4 of the glue did not. Now i have a sitcky mess, right where you woul rest your hands? WHY? WHy do you feel a need to ruin a nice laptop by putting non-removalble stickers in key areas?
customer_reviews.author: David Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: This little Chromebook is very nice and is pretty much what I expected. The only thing that keeps it from getting a 5 star rating from me is the intermittent popping that comes from the speakers. The speakers do sound good and video plays seamlessly over my wifi. Citrix Receiver allows for remote access to work which is the main reason I bought this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support Google play store
customer_reviews.text: I want to cry because this doesn't support Google play store! How did I not see that in the reviews? It's beautiful and I love it, but I think I have to send it back. More research tomorrow. UPDATE: I'm not a computer person. I have an Android. I thought I had to have play store to get an app I needed. I don't! Duh! This chromebook is absolutely PERFECT for me. It's fast, great picture, thin & lightweight. I highly recommend this if you want more than a tablet, but less than a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Folker

customer_reviews.title: Nice if they worked out the bugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chromebooks, this would have been my 3rd one but it completely shuts down like my other ones so that bug is not fixed yet where all of a suddent it goes black screen and then restarts only to have to sign in again. Its erratic in when it does it.
customer_reviews.author: C75

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is sort of a combined rating of this Chromebook and Chromium OS, as I'm not sure if the bugs are present across all models or just this one in particular. The items that I pin to the tray frequently disappear, and occasionally I get logged out of all of my accounts for no apparent reason. Hardware-wise, this has a great battery and feels sturdy thanks to the aluminum case. The front edge doesn't really align perfectly on mine, so there's a gap between the top and bottom shells which is disappointing. There's also no SD card slot in this model, but I knew that when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to work from home and didn't have a lot of money to spend. This one is perfect! I don't know how it works for gaming or videos, I don't do that, but for data entry, emails, and other basic work functions, it does great.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college student. Honestly should have just bought one of these in the first place instead of my $2k Laptop. Does everything i need it to much faster. Its also a lot lighter then my other laptop. Really good for laying in bed with it on your lap, or in a weird position where big bulky heavy laptops would be uncomfortable. Would sincerely recommend it to any college student besides people that absolutely need to run windows or macOS for their major.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ry

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, aluminum shell, 14 inches monitor, and decent resolution. Battery seems to be pretty good. I would be 100% satisfied, but as a MAC air and Pro user, I am feeling a little uneasy with the plastic feel of the keyboard and clicky feel of the touchpad. It almost bothers me a little. With the slow Celeron processor, browsing does not feel snappy. Actually you always feel the tiny lagging and hesitation. After all, it does whats supposed to do, and comparing with my MACs is just not fair.
customer_reviews.author: Ranierman

customer_reviews.title: Acer Chromebook 14
customer_reviews.text: I love my Acer Chromebook 14! This is the perfect little laptop for me, as it synces all of my Google accounts across my devices and I'm used to all things Google so it makes things easy. It is however, different than having a macbook or a laptop running Windows. It seems to have a pretty good battery life, a good picture, good sound, and isn't too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gmail and general web surfing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a oversees trip for just email and looking up sites to see. Worked well for email, but using chrome was not always on some web sites that wanted flash. Not all the apps worked as promised. Gmail was fine but apps like pdf readers and maps often crashed.
customer_reviews.author: M116

customer_reviews.title: Really nice chromebook. It is a much higher quality then ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice chromebook. It is a much higher quality then most chromebooks, it have an aluminum body. It is fast and has a very nice display. Looks like a mac air. It is a great computer to use for high school or middle school for sure. It having the google apps. Great for watching netflix or other streaming movie services. The sound is actually better then I thought. My daughter love it and said it's better then her other chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Google chrome is extremely glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chromebook for less than four months and it had been working smoothly until about a month ago. In the last month when I've been using google chrome, the keyboard consistently deletes as I type in searches. It usually functions fine after I restart the computer but that hasn't been working lately either.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: The Ford Pinto of chromebooks
customer_reviews.text: I've sworn by chromebooks for years, and this machine is making me consider the switch back to a conventional PC. It looks beautiful, but runs slower than any chromebook I've had before. Screen flickering. Weird crashes. Awful touchpad. The worst part is that some tabs will stop and refresh for no reason, and this issue keeps getting worse. A Google search tells me this is a RAM thing, but the pointless tab refreshing seems to happen randomly now, and nothing I have done has fixed the problem. It is nearly 2020, and my computer can only handle 1 tab at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Bearsfan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great machine, great features.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it for: internet surfing, blogging and writing and emails. I could not be happier with this computer because I am not the best person with technology. I don't know how to use a lot of computers but this is simple and easy to use. VERY easy to set up and light to carry. Just make sure wherever you take this little thing that you will have WIFI to connect or else your laptop will not work. So this is perfect for me (because I don't let it leave the house).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light-duty computer - buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: The Acer Chromebook 14 is ideal for surfing the internet, email, and day-to-day light duty spreadsheet and word processor work. We were debating whether to go with the big brand name $1,100 tablet but decided to take a chance on the Chromebook and we are so glad that we did! It’s fast, inexpensive, and easy to use. We have other machines for heavy-duty computing but the Acer Chromebook is quickly becoming our go-to device.
customer_reviews.author: KGC

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but nothing about it impressed me
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but nothing about it impressed me. I had an HP chromebook for 5 years until it wasn't supported any longer. In 5 years the technology is identical. Unfortunately, the price isn't, the new one costs 100 dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much. Bought this for a college kid that needed to be able to do basic word processing stuff and internet. It's been great. Didn't even have to get Microsoft Office Suite because now with Google documents, you don't need it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Collins

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is unacceptable, returned
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard was unacceptable, and for me, it was useless for typing. The spacebar would not register a keystroke unless I pressed it directly in the center, or pressed it very deliberately and firmly on the side, and so it frequently failed to register spaces. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: TR790

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I have multiple Macs in my home and got this as a laptop for web surfing. The laptop performs well and the display is great! As a mac user I was genuinely surprised at the quality for the color, resolution and brightness of the display. I have used the laptop with my NAS, music streaming and video streaming from my cable provider, it performs very very well. Great purchase for under $300. The only shortcoming is the lack of an SDHC card slot, if the product brought one I wouldve rated five stars.
customer_reviews.author: George Cosio

customer_reviews.title: Good with some issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, and does all what the public is saying, plays movies well, and sounds great. Small and light with a nice screen. That said the one I received had a defect that I'd advise purchasers to check for. When playing a movie on it I noticed a bright bleed through along the upper left and a bit on the lower left. This was super distracting in dark scenes. Please check. I've removed one star for quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Belaire

customer_reviews.title: Mom friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up and was easy to use. HDMI for putting screen on tv. Minimal setup or tutorial. 30seconds to set up wifi, etc. Not slow as long as you stick to what this chromebook does nice. chrome email msgs pictures youtube news etc. Not 4k video or gaming. Nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is the second chromebook I have got. It's totally worth the money. I thought about getting the cheaper one with white plastic shell, since I thought, it's a chromebook, I only expect it to do basic stuff, so the cheaper one will do. HOWEVER, I'm loving this aluminum 14-inch chromebook now! it's fast, stable, sturdy and elegant. great screen display. I feel acer kinda stole Apple's design in this one, but nothing to complain since I'm benefiting from with with less than 300$ spent
customer_reviews.author: I write reviews sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Very good spec and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and effective. Can use a lot of system resources without problem. Picture quality and color is fantastic. Although, IPS screen is matte not glossy, but it's up to your preference. Speakers are on the bottom, which is not effective for some case. Keyboard feels nice to type on. Touch pad is responsiveand, smooth, good as well. Outside silver with its all aluminum case feels and looks like it's made out of great quality. Doesn't weight too much either.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 7 months ago and I love it. There are online options that allow one to do almost anything that can be done on a Microsoft based PC. I can work all day without having to recharge, the speakers sound better than my friend's MacBook, great video recording and audio recording! This is my second Chromebook and my next purchase will be a Chromebase to replace my home PC.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet great quality
customer_reviews.text: Decided my desk top days were over, looked into several laptops, for simplicity, ease, great quality I chose this chrome book and have been pleased. Very happy and really recommend to all who are looking for a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kish

customer_reviews.title: Some keyboard keys no longer work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these Chromebooks for my children. They were required by their school district. After one year both Chromebooks had the same issue, "a" key and some others keys in the immediate vicinity are intermittent or nonfunctional. I had repaired since I had a warranty. It worked okay for awhile and same problem came back. Strange that both Chromebooks would experience the same issue. Does not seem like a big issue but if a couple keys don't work it is NOT GOOD FOR CHILD'S SCHOOL WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: already cutting out
customer_reviews.text: use it every day, but starting yesterday, it darkens then goes black. close and re open and it's ok for awhile...bought a warranty, will see if it's honored if this keeps up
customer_reviews.author: Pop Harris

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook as a replacement for my 6 year old MacBook, which was causing me nothing bur problems. I researched laptops of most every description and manufacturer in the under $500 category. I chose this one based on reviews from customers, Consumer Reports and PC magazine. So far, I am totally impressed with it. The speed , the graphics and the battery life are outstanding. It is feather-light. And best of all it was under $300. There was also an added bonus of a wireless mouse. I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best non computer ever!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I'm a Chromebook fan. Purchase my first Chromebook seven or eight years ago and is still running strong. Only purchased this one because I read that my first Chromebook would stop receiving updates since it is so old. However the old one is still receiving updates so I let the kids use it. Never have had a problem with the Chromebook and enjoy how fast they start up. Every once in a while you may encounter a website that is not designed for the Chrome OS and will not function properly. This is very rare though.
customer_reviews.author: StealthSurvivalist

customer_reviews.title: Bought May 2018
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chromebook May 2018. I t is now August 21, 2019 and the screen has lines had is very hard to read. So I guess I have to buy a new chrome book. Don't buy this one. As you can see it lasted 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great web browsing laptop with good batter life
customer_reviews.text: -- great battery life - only pushed it to about 4 hours so far with regular use - Youtube, email, web browsing, etc -- nice construction and light weight -- wife approved -- personally used mainly for email and browsing -- wife has used it frequently with Google Docs -- keyboard is fine/okay - nothing bad to report, but nothing great to report either -- mouse pad seems responsive enough - again, nothing bad to report, but nothing great to report either
customer_reviews.author: someone 00000002

customer_reviews.title: Great, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Had Samsumg 11.6" screen for 3 years, it still works great but wanted a bigger screen. Unit is very solid, great high quality feel of the whole system. Turn it on, log in and go. Doesn't get any easier than that. Now just have to hide it from the grandchildren who are using them at school all the time. Only difficulty was finding the right combination of screen resolution / font size for web sites so that I can easily read.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gruenberg

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an HP laptop that was about five years old. All can say is WOW!! I will never buy anything but a Chromebook for web surfing and Internet use!! Blazing fast and an almost instant start up! Very easy to use/user friendly!! A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Jack870

customer_reviews.title: Off to a not-so-good start
customer_reviews.text: Computer arrived nonfunctional. More than 2 hours on the phone with 2 different Acer "service" center people difficult to understand concluded with instructions to send the device to Texas for "repair." That cost several days worth of use. It's working now, but not without "hiccups." I had to "update" it just to sign onto Amazon Smile. (Love Amazon!) Chromebooks are great, but this one hasn't worked out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mikethegardener

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Chromebook purchase and I have to say that I'm enjoying the speed and simplicity of it. As a Windows and Mac user, I wasn't sure if I could benefit from using ChromeOS, but I find myself using it more than I anticipated. It's also supposed to get an update to run apps from Google Play that would greatly enhance the capabilities of it. In summary, it looks great and performs very well. Can't really complain at all. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: Great Chromebook for the price. Easy set up and FAST. Aluminum finish looks great; hopefully I won’t scratch it up. Still learning the Chrome OS but no issues at all. Battery life is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: GVC

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: This computer was great for one year. I used it for writing reports nothing extensive. Now the backspace button and other letter buttons do not work. I expected it to last a lot longer than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby not frustrated like he is with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband and he LOVES it. Just the right size for him to carry from room to play cards or surf the web.. He particularly likes u-tube as he enjoys watching history videos. He doesn't get frustrated with it like the windows 10. I think I may have found another chromebook fan like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer827

customer_reviews.title: Not a gaming laptop but works for school
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for school. I bought also so the kids could play Minecraft and/or Fortnite but they cannot on this laptop. Still works just fine for e-learning. Not a touchscreen either
customer_reviews.author: suber

customer_reviews.title: Super affordable yet looks like a  much more expensive laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter when she needed one to get her GED. She's very happy with it! Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules Carlson

customer_reviews.title: after 6 months, very slow
customer_reviews.text: i've had this computer for 6 months now. it is now very slow! my phone is faster than this. waste of money. imo, this is a no go. go for a lenovo yoga or something else.
customer_reviews.author: B. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I've had this CB for a year and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this CB for a year and a half and haven't had any problems....no viruses either....something that I can't say about my Windows machines.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Cursor not working less than three weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: It is 4/17. I started using the computer on 3/31 with a spring break in there. Everything was fine at the beginning but in the last two work days the cursor keeps disappearing. Yesterday it was about five times. So far today (11:30 am) it has disappeared twice. This is unacceptable. Have to start work all over logging into every application. Working from home as a teacher and every minute counts.
customer_reviews.author: PrimePurchaser

customer_reviews.title: Metal body and fast performance, what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Chromebook, and I'm impressed! Love the big screen, quality build, and responsive system. I've read some reviews where they knock the keyboard for not having enough play in the keys, but I don't think it's an issue. 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: DeanH1234

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe this computer is so low in price. The design looks like a Mac and runs like my Galaxy. I LOVE IT. I may buy a second one for my Wife. We intended on sharing the computer but with this price, we can buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Just what I needed. My Windows Laptop would take a half hour to boot up - This flip it open and you are in business one second - two at the tops! And great price. PC Mag top choice - I did not go wrong! I have no use for Windows - Nothing but an unreliable pain. I love google!
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Neubrand

customer_reviews.title: Almost 2 Years In - Still Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this Chromebook, it's a great buy. It's fast, looks slick, and the battery lasts for ever. I purchased this Sept 2017 and am still loving it, using it every day at work. Very professional and fits in with all the Macbooks in the office. XD
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Prost

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook 14, Aluminum, 14-inch Full HD, Intel Celeron N3160, 4GB LPDDR3, 32GB, Chrome, CB3-431-C5FM
product_meta.description:
Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431-C5FM comes with these high level specs: Intel Celeron N3160 Quad-Core Processor 1.6GHz with Intel Burst Technology up to 2.24GHz, Google Chrome Operating System, 14" Full HD ComfyViewTM Widescreen IPS LED-backlit Display, Intel HD Graphics, 4GB LPDDR3 SDRAM Memory, 32GB Internal Storage, 802.11ac WiFi featuring MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), Bluetooth 4.2, HD Webcam (1280 x 720) with 88 degree wide angle lens supporting High Dynamic Range (HDR), 2 - USB 3.0 Ports, 1 - HDMI Port, 3-Cell Li-Polymer Battery (3950 mAh), Up to 12-hours Battery Life, 3.42 lbs. | 1.55 kg (system unit only) (NX.GC2AA.007)

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Chromebook runs on Chrome OS - an operating system by Google that is built for the way we live today. It comes with built-in virus protection, updates automatically*, boots up in seconds and continues to stay fast over time. (*Internet connection is required)
All the Google apps you know and love come standard on every Chromebook, which means you can edit, download, and convert Microsoft Office files in Google Docs, Sheets and Slides
With the Google Play Store, you can access a rich library of apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines, and more, all from your Chromebook
Chromebooks come with built-in storage for offline access to your most important files and an additional 100GB of Google Drive space to ensure that all of your files are backed up automatically
100% Aluminum Chassis, Intel Celeron N3160, 14” Full HD, 4GB Memory, 32GB eMMC, Up to 12-hours Battery Life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,522 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
